benchmark_details.name: MedHallBench
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark framework for evaluating and mitigating hallucinations in Medical Large Language Models (MLLMs).
resources: Assessment of Caption Hallucinations in Medical Imagery (ACHMI)

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess and mitigate hallucinations in medical large language models.

data.source: Expert validated medical case scenarios and established medical databases.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on comparisons with expert evaluations and existing medical benchmarks.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate the degree of accuracy and hallucination in model outputs.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparison with state-of-the-art models established various benchmark results.
methodology.validation: Multi-tiered evaluation system combining expert assessments and quantitative metrics.

targeted_risks.harm: Potentially harmful misdiagnoses or inappropriate treatment arising from hallucinations in medical domain outputs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data privacy is ensured through expert-validation and compliance with consultation standards.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Dataset ensures compliance with international consultation standards.
